website_summaries.verdict: A bold, versatile women's motorcycle jacket that will help you stay safe and comfortable any time you ride.
pros: Boasts a FreeAir mesh torso and back with textile reinforced shoulders and arms that provide tremendous flexibility
Offers CE-approved armor at the shoulders and elbows for extra protection
Provides a nine-point SureFit custom adjustment system that is simple to use
Available in a wide range of colors and sizes
cons: The jacket's liner sometimes bunches when the jacket is zipped

customer_reviews.title: Not for the driver
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I LOVE this jacket, but it's not for me. This is a great jacket as a passenger, but not for the driver. When I put my arms up, the shoulder armor uncomfortably digs into my skin. If that didn't happen I would have kept it. Also, I am 5'6 133lbs and got the Small and it fit perfect. Pros: Lightweight, stylish, protective Cons: Shoulder armor digs into skin while arms are up driving the bike. When arms are up, it chokes me a bit.
customer_reviews.author: R Kapp

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket, exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is amazing! I'm thrilled with it. I'm a weird shape, tall, large busted, small waist, it fit perfect. The pads are fierce, I feel protected. The mesh is just right, plenty of ventilation but the jacket is solid in enough places I don't feel the wind on the highway, even with the insert removed. It's a beautiful color and the decorative stitching is eye catching. I love the neckline. I ordered an XL, plenty of room to move but feels like a tailored fit. The price was really great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Buntain

customer_reviews.title: top heavy
customer_reviews.text: just got it and I love it.....when you purchase get a size bigger......im 167 lbs I got a large it fits great just a lil snug its my summer jacket so t-shirts will work with it ...im top heavy...a x large would most likely be a lil bulky for me. FAST service 2 days..... I also checked out joe rocket motorcycle shoes they have the best looking shoes for females. so my next order will be joe rocket shoes....LOVE YOU AMAZON! Hope this post helps for women with top heavy figures....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a great riding jacket - and it comes with many extras - elbow and shoulder pads, waterproof liner (with a velcro closing over the zipper. The jacket without the liner has very breezy mesh so I can wear in warm weather. Just stunning to look at. I am a ultra curvy woman, and this fits beautifully in length - along with cool belts across the back so that you can size it just the way you want to. I was concerned because of the 'wine' color - but it is red. I look forward to wearing this riding my red HD trike, and wearing my red matching helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for over a month and love the jacket. Take the liner out, and it is perfect for warmer days, or leave the liner in on cooler days. Also as a typical woman my weight fluctuates, and this jacket has tons of different adjustments making it perfect for me. And I get lots of compliments on how nice looking it is, and how much people like that it is not another black riding jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Bird

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a nice women’s summer riding jacket. This is it! It’s gorgeous. I love the style and it’s perfect for the Northern California summers. It’s meshy enough to not be too hot and safer than wearing no jacket. I am 5’4” tall with a 32” inseam - long legs, short waist. I weigh about 165 and wear a size 10. I got an XL because I’m a bit busty and it fit over my boobs just fine. The adjustments on the back make it fit perfectly. Great summer jacket with good body armor.
customer_reviews.author: Angel's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Size chart needs to be corrected
customer_reviews.text: I love this jackets cut, and that it’s not poorly constructed. My only dislike is that the size chart is inaccurate. My bust is 44, waist is 39, and hi hip, not the wides point is 50 inches... so I ordered the xxxl. When I put the jacket on, it’s is 4-6 inches too big even with the straps in the back pulled taut. I’ve returned it and will definitely reorder this jacket at probably the xl or Large because it can be drawn tighter around the body.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: SO Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better in person! I’m 5’7” 130lb, and ordered a SM. It is still a little loose even with the straps fully tightened, but I think the XS would have been too short in the sleeves and torso. The quality is excellent, there is beautiful detail work, a very nice waterproof liner, and comes with extra snaps in case one fails. The logo color is different (better) than pictured and has some sparkle to it! It is comfortable, and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I read the reviews and ordered down
customer_reviews.text: I was so unsure what size to order. I normally wear everything 16. I'm 5'7", 220 lbs and a bit big in the chest. My measurements per the chart said I should order a 3X. I'm glad I read the reviews and ordered down. The 2X fits PERFECTLY - I love it! The tag on the inside says 1 Diva - so different people will see different sizes to order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, runs small in shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. It’s a beautiful jacket with lots of features. My advice is to pay attention to sizing, and if you are broad shouldered, go up. Although the chart had her as a Large in every way, the shoulders were too small (not on the chart). I contacted the seller and they were amazing! Had her replacement in just a few days. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: S. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: I ride with my husband and I needed my own jacket. it is hard to find jackets that fit busty women, received my jacket today and it fits a little loose but you can tighten the back straps to form to your body. The liner is perfect for night riding, remove the liner for riding during the day and in warmer temps. I have a white Icon Chantilly helmet and this jacket looks perfect with it! (black & white).
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Beatty

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Beautiful Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I tried to order this last year and I received a message it was on backorder. I patiently waited and received another message saying it was still delayed. I ended up cancelling the order! It was not through your company! When I went back again to look I found it and in my size with maybe a 10 day delivery! I immediately jumped on it! I was NOT DISAPPOINTED! I am in love with this Jacket! It matches my bike color, love the design of the jacket and design on it! Love the adjustment on the back and arms! 110% Satisfied!! If I could give it more than 5 Stars I would! ❤
customer_reviews.author: L. Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket! Especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jacket. You can remove the inner lining. So far, it’s been summer so I’ve only worn it with the lining removed. I did try it on with the lining and it felt comfortable and warm. This jacket fits well. A bit wide in the shoulders for me. But only slightly. But all the padding is correct and comfortable. Without the lining, it is cool enough to ride in the summer but still feel protected. I really like the look of the jacket as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Querrie

customer_reviews.title: I love this white coat with sparkles that are silver:)
customer_reviews.text: I love the motorcycle jacket!!!! Such a great product that comes clean well even though it is a white coat.....My last coat I have cleaned and this is why I know. It is just like my last one but I ordered a large size due to gaining weight this last year. My last one I purchased in store and it cost me so much more then my online order that arrived quickly too! I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: emmie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its heavier then you would think but not bad enough to have a problem. Actually I absolutely love it. I think it may actually run a little big. All in all this jacket is well made and is absolutely beautiful!~!!
customer_reviews.author: Wanta

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was so excited to try it on when it arrived!!! I wish it was a little longer but I absolutely love it! I normally wear 3 long sleeves riding, I'm so excited to only have to wear 1 now!!!
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Tight on chest but great buy
customer_reviews.text: bought a medium it is a tight squeeze in the chest area so if you are a C or bigger I suggest going a size up. Other than that I find it snug and comfortable and the material is perfect for Florida heat when you take the waterproof liner out it is extremely breathable. love the inner chest pocket and head phone access is perfect for those who haven't gotten a helmet headset yet. Great quality for the price would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesh/textile riding jack
customer_reviews.text: It's little pricy for a mesh but I really like it My only comment is I wish it was longer through the body. I'm tall and the jacket is made as a short cut. Still awesomeness
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read the comments on this jacket. I ordered the small (34C) and still have enough room to put a hoodie or thick sweater underneath. I like the way the jacket is tapered for a woman's body. I can't wait for the nice spring and early summer days to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly. The back corset really helps, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. The back corset really helps, the liner works perfectly, and the jacket is loose enough to wear any other layering you need for winter. "Wine" matches my "wine" color HJC helmet, too. Classy for all us women riders!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a girly girl but didn't want a 'black' jacket. Love the this design. Nice air flow and easy to remove pads as needed. I'm 5'4, 165lb and got the XL. It's a little loose even with the liner & straps pulled but that works for me; especially since I plan to ride in cooler weather & will need a pullover. May buy smaller size if I loose more weight. Doesn't hurt that it matches my Joe Rocket Nation Women gloves & white 2018 Executive Burgman 650.
customer_reviews.author: Charissa G Harper

customer_reviews.title: Looks and safety conscious
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, well padded, only reason I didnt give 5 stars is I’m a novice bike shopper and really don’t have anything to compare it to. Purchased for someone 5’4” 140 with a C bust, bought a large and fit well
customer_reviews.author: H. Brand

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a mesh (with insert) jacket to wear on the warm days of riding. This jacket isn't only ~beautiful~ it is extremely sturdy and I feel very well protected ... and I get a lot of comments. Fits true to size with adjustable straps on the back to ensure a good fit. Absolutely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RegQueen

customer_reviews.title: Lousy quality!
customer_reviews.text: Over-priced! Stitches came off near the side pocket after a few times wearing & getting larger. The materials are not good at all, very stiff, coarse, harsh. It only looks good on the web page. The Rip happened right after the return window. I'm not a frequent rider, the rip happened with no unusual impact whatsoever on the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Search101

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this jacket. This is her favorite riding jacket by far. It is extremely hot here in OK. She took the liners out for our summer rides and it breathes and let's enough air in to keep her cool and safe at the same time. It matches her Shoei helmet too!
customer_reviews.author: Rich65k

customer_reviews.title: The 3 adjustable straps on the back of the jacket help get it snug and create shape instead of being a boring boxy riding jacket
customer_reviews.text: I needed a summer jacket that would breath and still protect. I'm 5'2" and busty and the Medium fit perfectly. The 3 adjustable straps on the back of the jacket help get it snug and create shape instead of being a boring boxy riding jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A great jacket for warm weather
customer_reviews.text: This is a great warm weather jacket. It's got mesh in the front and forearms that helps with air flow. The material quality is simply superb. It feels tough and protective. Would strongly recommend this for spring, summer and early fall riding.
customer_reviews.author: Sindhu

customer_reviews.title: A must for warm climates
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3", apx. 130 pounds, with a average chest size, slightly thick waist, and small hips. I ordered the medium but wondered if a small would have fit. There's plenty of room in the bust and the hips fit just right. The arms are a little long but conform to my arm better with the help of the sleeve adjuster. I've decided to keep the medium so that in cooler weather I can layer underneath it. With the waterproof liner taken out, I definitely see how it will be much cooler than my Alpine for Florida weather.
customer_reviews.author: Bikermama81

customer_reviews.title: Great riding jacket at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is high quality and looks great. I bought one size up and the fit is perfect. Can wear sweater under it, even when liner is in. Adjustable back buckles really give this jacket a fitted look. Ride on!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice coat. a little tight in the neck but I wont wear turtlenecks either. get lots of complements.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" with a 36G bust. I bought a large and the adjustments makes this jacket fit great. Not too small across the bust line and not too big everywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: The size chart is spot on. I was a couple inches larger in one area, but fell within the other two areas. I wear a women's medium shirt. I got a large jacket. The buckles in the back help cinch it in a bit. Great jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Universal Presents

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mesh Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Luv this jacket. I actually use the inside rain coat to keep warm when riding in the mornings. I would of thought it would be a bit heavy with the pads, but it's actually pretty good. I love the look and in some parts in it actually shines.
customer_reviews.author: Paty Q

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this jacket! I have only worn it in the summer, and with the liner removed, it's very breathable in the heat. One chilly evening, I put the liner in, and it really made a difference in keeping out the air and having a comfortable ride. I'm short and curvy at 5'1 and 150lbs, and went with the XL. There's plenty of room if I needed a sweatshirt, but doesn't feel too bulky with just a tank top.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca T.

customer_reviews.title: Women will LOVE this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my girl and she absolutely loves it. The color is a great wine, breathes excellent and provides great mobility. Very cute on her too!!!
customer_reviews.author: ebrewskii

customer_reviews.title: This is 'the' choice!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Living in Florida, need that breeze while riding and this is the jacket for that. Late January and I ride without the lining. This jacket runs true to size adjusts easily with back and wrist adjustments. Looks great with great quality material! Buy this one, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breathable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and fits well. Extremely breathable and well ventilated right now for summer. I haven’t had it for cold weather, so I’m not sure how warm it will be
customer_reviews.author: Koloni

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit like I would want it to
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit like I would want it to. I'm 5'11 and thin and tried both the L and XL. The sleeves are a bit short and tight under the armpits with the L, but the XL is designed for a full figure woman. I ended up keeping the L.
customer_reviews.author: WLaurenB

customer_reviews.title: Stylish well made jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this jacket. The adjustment options really ensure a great fit. I purchased the grey and white version of this jacket and am very pleased. It is stylish, but has all the proper padding and vents well. Five stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Minion lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice women's motorcycle jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable jacket and is true to my coat size. The inner wind jacket lining is easily removed, but doesn't bunch up like other mesh jackets. It has a handy inner chest pocket for phone/wallet. AND- it's pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Ewoldt

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very happy with this Jacket. Looks awesome! The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Super Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the jacket! Looks sleek and has a lot of support for bike riding! However had to return it, and didn't get to use it; since I order the wrong size and jacket type, as I was ordering for my sister. Keeping my error aside, the jacket is ideal for rides. Highliy recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Huma Kapadia

customer_reviews.title: Nice stylish mesh jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket and will double as a rain coat. I have always owned leather but wanted to protect my skin in hot weather too. It also has adjustments in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is awesome. if i were to ask for more
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome. if i were to ask for more: deeper pockets on the sides and an additonal interior pocket besides the one for your ipod. In the store i tried on a medium but online there was only a large, glad i got the large! if you want to wear this to ride in the mtns on a cool day or toward evening be prepared to layer! Not made for warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Jacket! the Medium fit perfectly, and of course it looks amazing! with the liner in, it is even reasonably warm, for these cooler days of riding. love the fit as well. a great jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Togstad

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I'm short and I like the fact that the sleeves aren't way to long for me. Tailored fits well. Inside pocket for phone.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela  murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for when I am riding my motorcycle. I like that it is very reflective.
customer_reviews.author: Suzumi Ashiya

customer_reviews.title: LOVIN' IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first kinda felt it was too big, but once I got my son to adjust the back straps right, LOVE THE FIT! And it's very comfortable and breathes wonderfully when riding on a hot day! Love having the protection, looking good & yet not sweating like crazy while riding!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Straps are white not black.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is super cute and fits very well. The only thing that I didn't like was that the straps on the back are advised as black but they are actually white. Which is whatever, but I really like the black straps look. Other than that great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: JACKET OK. I AM NOT A PICKY PERSON BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: JACKET OK. I AM NOT A PICKY PERSON BUT THE JACKET FIT APPEARS TO BE BULKY FOR BROAD SHOULDER GIRL. I RETURNED IT.
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: Smart investment
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket! The liner works extremely well for cooler climate riding and it is very comfortable and feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Canda Flores

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful jacket and comfortable. It still gets a little hot in the summer, but better than the other jackets I have.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Size is right.
customer_reviews.text: The size of this jacket is perfect. It fits my full figure frame well. Even has extra room that I can add a sweatshirt under when the weather is chilly. I love that it has a hole designed for my ear buds as I love to listen to my music while riding. I would recommend this jacket to anyone who is plus size.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lee Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: love this jacket looks good with the yamaha R6!!!! Need a winter coat to go with it. Yami please put out the old blue and white leather!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Excelent confortable. Perfect fit. Nice design color goid for both weather cokd and hot nive fit in the back. Not bulky at all
customer_reviews.author: cover

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely looove this jacket, exactly what i was ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely looove this jacket, exactly what i was looking for and for the price ( 70$ ) was a killer deal!! LOOOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: silentmonkey11

customer_reviews.title: It FITS!
customer_reviews.text: It fits! I went to the local motorcycle gear shop and tried on various jackets. I'm usually a 2x, but my boobs are too big for a 2x motorcycle jacket, so I tried the 3x and it was fine. I'm apprehensive about if online orders will fit and I was glad that this particular jacket fit perfectly. My advice is to do the same: go to the local shop to size first. I just got it in the mail, so I haven't taken it for a test drive yet.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the jacket, just wish I ordered it in the right size : ( Now I have to go through the hassle of paying for shipping ($9.50 x 2) just to get the right size. Aside from that the padding isn't what I would've expected from Joe Rocket brand jackets. I've brought a few of their jackets in the past and this by far was the worst. It has a cheap feel to it, but then again, you get what you pay for. Also, it's kind of hard to believe that this is a summer jacket. You won't catch me wearing this thing in 85 degree and up weather! : )
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Herron

customer_reviews.title: it would be nice if it had additional zippers for breathe-ability
customer_reviews.text: Item is much smaller than item description! I normally wear a small T-shirt; the proper fit of jacket is a Large. Be AWARE! Although the product does come with a nifty inner liner thats waterproof, it would be nice if it had additional zippers for breathe-ability. Snug and sleek Womens Cut design fitting.
customer_reviews.author: The Moore's

customer_reviews.title: A tight fit for huge boobs, but still great.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé is 5'1 @ 145# with a humongous rack and while the medium is a tight squeeze, it does fit her comfortably because of the vast adjustability and she seems to love the jacket. The mesh breathes very effectively, and for someone who enjoys cooler temperatures than most people, she loved riding in it in 60°F weather without the liner. This is a classy riding jacket with adequate armor.
customer_reviews.author: Al Abadilla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket. Very comfy. Has a nice fit to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket, quick shipping. Based on reviews of this jacket fitting larger, I ordered one size smaller and fits perfectly . Love it
customer_reviews.author: jessey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice jacket. Completely fits and is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this jacket to replace a four year old version of the exact same jacket that got damaged in a wreck. (it did it's job beautifully, I might add!) I have an audio system on my bike and didn't need the plastic electronics chest pocket, so I removed it to let more air through. Don't miss the pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jacket although I wish it was a little more fitted but I imagine that would be difficult to find while still offering enough protection. I currently have removed the liner which is nice in the summer time it allows air to flow.
customer_reviews.author: Sena

customer_reviews.title: Stolen from my luggage
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this amazing product BUT I am very sad I did not receive it, as it was stolen from the luggage when it was coming to my Country. So I did not have the experience, but it seems to be a great product. :(
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

product_meta.title: Joe Rocket Cleo 2.2 Women's Mesh Motorcycle Riding Jacket (Wine/Black/Black, X-Large)
product_meta.description: Size:X-Large| Color:Wine/Black/BlackThe freshest ladies mesh jacket in motorcycling gets freshened-up with new a graphic treatment and bold new colors.
feature_bullets: FreeAir mesh torso and back with textile reinforced shoulders and arms
C.E. approved armor at the shoulders and elbows (removable); Removable spine pad with pocket for optional C.E. spine protector
8 zipper for pant attachment; Reflective stripe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
